name: PiPedal
desc: Fully built guitar pedal connected to it's own online application. Uses neural networks to detect external sound effects and replicate them.

name: CATBooks
desc: Built a book-sharing website where users can post books and add reviews/comments. Calculates ratings and shows top performing books.

name: ROBLOX Video Games
desc: Developed several video games using Lua with ROBLOX generating several hundreds of thousands of players and thousands of dollars in personal revenue.
